definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Rock category with a K-carrageenan a rally.
sentences.chinese: 可與矸類K一型卡拉膠形成凝聚。

sentences.english: The advancement about the biological activities of carrageenan oligosaccharides is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹了近年來卡拉膠寡糖活性的研究進展。

sentences.english: And the annual production of carrageenan has far exceeded the production of agar worldwide now.
sentences.chinese: 現在世界卡拉膠的年總產量已遠遠超過瓊脂的產量。
